channel.title: Master Thesis on LOCS
channel.description: Recent content in Master Thesis on LOCS

item.title: A Machine Learning approach to detect Malicious Web servers based on Whois and DNS Information
ADT Industry Survey
item.description: Interview a series of people in industry who work with ADTs to find how they use them, why they use them, how they are perceived (what do they find useful), etc.

item.title: ADT Online Survey
item.description: Create a survey to be given either in-person or via crowdsourcing that seeks to understand the comprehensibility of attack trees to laypeople.

item.title: ADT Web App User Study
item.description: Design and run a user study on the usability of the previously built ADT Web App tool. Find what the strengths and weaknesses of the tool are in a scientific manner.

item.title: General Threat Communication Survey
item.description: Create a survey to be given either in-person or via crowdsourcing to establish what information is received when threats are communicated. How does this information change based on how the threat is communicated?
